verses.name: Matthew 20:31
verses.text: And the multitude rebuked them, because they should hold their peace: but they cried the more, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, thou Son of David.

verses.name: Matthew 20:32
verses.text: And Jesus stood still, and called them, and said, What will ye that I shall do unto you?

verses.name: Matthew 20:33
verses.text: They say unto him, Lord, that our eyes may be opened.

verses.name: Matthew 20:34
verses.text: So Jesus had compassion on them, and touched their eyes: and immediately their eyes received sight, and they followed him.
